mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_script ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, uuid TEXT NOT NULL, code TEXT, createdBy TEXT NOT NULL, createdTime TEXT NOT NULL, updatedTime TEXT NOT NULL )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_script(id, uuid, code, createdBy, createdTime, updatedTime) VALUES (#{id}, #{uuid}, #{code}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT uuid, code, createdBy, createdTime, updatedTime FROM t_script WHERE uuid = #{uuid}
